```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(bib2df)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE
  , message = FALSE
)
```

# References

Hey, look, references!

```{r }
tbl_ref <- bib2df('references.bib') %>% 
  rename_all(tolower) 

tbl_ref %>% 
  select(
    category, title, author
  ) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
